com.clrs

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clrs.Config

  • public class Config
extends Object
    This class holds common information about the program.

    It provides uniform directories for input and output to the programs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean APPEND_OFF
      This variable can be used to turn off append modes for files.
      static boolean APPEND_ON
      This variable can be used to turn on append modes for files.
      private static String BOOK_VERSION
      The edition of the book which is supported.
      static String INPUT_FOLDER
      A directory from where inputs can be received.
      static String OUTPUT_FOLDER
      A directory where the outputs can be stored.
      private static String PROGRAM_NAME
      Records the name of the book.
      private static String PROGRAM_VERSION
      The program version typically following Linux Kernel versioning.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Config() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getBookVersion()
      Gets the edition of the book which the current program supports.
      static String getProgramInfo()
      Gets the program information of the form <book>-<edition>-<version>.
      static String getProgramName()
      Gets the program name for the current program.
      static String getProgramVersion()
      Gets the program version where the versioning system matches that followed by the Linux Kernel.

    • Field Detail

      • PROGRAM_NAME

        private static final String PROGRAM_NAME
        Records the name of the book.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROGRAM_VERSION

        private static final String PROGRAM_VERSION
        The program version typically following Linux Kernel versioning.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BOOK_VERSION

        private static final String BOOK_VERSION
        The edition of the book which is supported.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • INPUT_FOLDER

        public static String INPUT_FOLDER
        A directory from where inputs can be received. Any change to this variable affects the whole program.

      • OUTPUT_FOLDER

        public static String OUTPUT_FOLDER
        A directory where the outputs can be stored. Any change to this variable affects the whole program.

      • APPEND_OFF

        public static final boolean APPEND_OFF
        This variable can be used to turn off append modes for files.

        When this mode is set any existing files will be deleted and recreated.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • APPEND_ON

        public static final boolean APPEND_ON
        This variable can be used to turn on append modes for files.

        When this mode is set any existing files will be appended to.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public Config()

    • Method Detail

      • getProgramInfo

        public static String getProgramInfo()
        Gets the program information of the form <book>-<edition>-<version>.
        Returns:
        The program info which contains the book, edition and version.

      • getProgramName

        public static String getProgramName()
        Gets the program name for the current program.
        Returns:
        The program name.

      • getBookVersion

        public static String getBookVersion()
        Gets the edition of the book which the current program supports.
        Returns:
        The edition of the book which is supported.

      • getProgramVersion

        public static String getProgramVersion()
        Gets the program version where the versioning system matches that followed by the Linux Kernel.
        Returns:
        The current program version.
